languages.text: If the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +20% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the wielder hasn't moved during their turn, their cover efficiency is increased by +20% for 1 round. If the wielder moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% dodge for 1 round. Base armour property: +20% dodge against ranged attacks.

If the wearer hasn't moved during their turn, their cover efficiency is increased by +20% for 1 round. If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% dodge for 1 round. Base armour property: +20% dodge against ranged attacks.

If the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +20% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

languages.text: Si el portador no se ha movido durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} aumenta un +20 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Si el portador se mueve al menos 3 casillas por turno, gana +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} durante 1 asalto. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}: +20 % de esquiva contra ataques {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}a distancia{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +20% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador no se ha movido durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} aumenta un +20 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Si el portador se mueve al menos 3 casillas por turno, gana +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} durante 1 asalto. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}: +20 % de esquiva contra ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}.

languages.text: 如果装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中没有移动，则装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}提高20%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果装备者至少移动了3格，则获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，持续一轮。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}攻击时，获得+20%闪避。
languages.original_text: If the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +20% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中没有移动，则装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}提高20%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果装备者至少移动了3格，则获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，持续一轮。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击时，获得+20%闪避。

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de sa couverture{/g} augmente de +20 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Si l'utilisateur se déplace d'au moins 3 cases par tour, il bénéficie de +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pendant 1 round. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +20 % d'esquive contre les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}à distance{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +20% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de sa couverture{/g} augmente de +20 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Si l'utilisateur se déplace d'au moins 3 cases par tour, il bénéficie de +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} pendant 1 round. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de base : +20 % d'esquive contre les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn sich der Träger während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} nicht bewegt hat, erhöht sich seine {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} um +20 %, und zwar 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang. Bewegt sich der Träger um mindestens 3 Felder pro Zug, erlangt er für 1 Runde +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}: +20 % Ausweichen gegen {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +20% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: Wenn sich der Träger während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} nicht bewegt hat, erhöht sich seine {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} um +20 %, und zwar 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang. Bewegt sich der Träger um mindestens 3 Felder pro Zug, erlangt er für 1 Runde +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}: +20 % Ausweichen gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に動かなかった場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー効率{/g}は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間 +20%上昇する。使用者が1ターンの間に最低3セル動く場合、1ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が +20%上昇する。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃に対して回避 +20%
languages.original_text: If the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +20% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に動かなかった場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー効率{/g}は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間 +20%上昇する。使用者が1ターンの間に最低3セル動く場合、1ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}が +20%上昇する。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}特性：{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃に対して回避 +20%

languages.text: Если персонаж не двигается в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективность укрытия{/g} для него повышается на 20% на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Если персонаж в свой ход перемещается хотя бы на 3 клетки, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} увеличивается на 20% на 1 раунд. Базовое свойство: +20% к уклонению от {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционных атак{/g}.

If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round. Базовое свойство: +20% к уклонению от {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционных{/g} атак.
